name: EGCG Set
description:
Pamper yourself with the Odbo Total Care Program by purchasing your favourite Wrinkletox Serum, Shape Memory Lifting Essence & EGCG Ampoule all in one set! 

With this set, not only are you able to save on purchasing all 3 of them separately, but you are able to achieve effective whitening, lifting and say goodbye to dull and aging skin! Tested and proven by many happy users of Odbo, what are you waiting for?

name: The GaGa Perfect Mascara & Eyebrow Pencil
description: The perfect combination to boost the area of your eyes! With the eyebrow pencil and perfect masacara, you will find the area around your eyes emphasized to create that ideal dolly eyes.

name: Collagen Hydra-Mask
description:
Collagen Hydra-Mask is the most popular mask among Ginseng and Vitamin C!

The mask contains high concentrations of Collagen which deeply penetrates to keep loose and saggy skin firm and richly nourishing beauty essence to shine and revitalize the skin. A single application leaves the skin moisturized and crystal-clear.

This pre-cut sheet contains active beauty ingredients as well as Collagen which is the most important protein in human body to soften dead skin cells and to protect the skin from various pollution factors, firming the skin. The essence mask sheet is easy to use and revitalizes to keep the skin looking healthier and attractive. 

How to use:
Shake the sachet to spread the essence evenly on the mask before applying sheet mask over cleansed face. Leave the sheet on for 20-30minutes and gently pat excess essence to let it be absorbed into the skin.

Contents: 10 sheets x 20g each


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________


All ingredients (INCI): Aqua, 1.3 Butylene glycol, Glycerin, Ethanol, Sodium hyaluronate, Xantangum, PEG-60 Hydrogenated castor oil, Methylparaben, Tocopheryl acetate, Imidazolidinyl urea, Hamamelis virginiana extract, Betaine, Allantoin, Sodium citrate, Panthenol, Dipotassium glycyrrhizinate, Disodium EDTA, Perfume, Collagen (0.001%)

name: Vitamin C Essential Brightening Mask
description:
Vitamin C is a great solution in skin care. Vitamin C is an excellent water soluble antioxidant that destroys free radicals preventing pre-mature aging as well as having other important roles in various bodily functions such as the formation of bones, assists in the formation of collagen and repairing scar tissues among others. As such, Vitamin C is a very important ingredient to skin's benefits. Itâ€™s a mask that specially formulated for skin brightening & soothing.

How to use :
Gently apply sheet mask over cleansed face. Leave the sheet on for 20-30minutes and gently pat excess essence to let it be absorbed into the skin.

Contents :  10 sheets x 20g each


MADE IN KOREA

name: Ginseng Mask
description:
This strengthening mask pack contains Ginseng, Collagen and Coenzyme Q10 which helps to firm up and improves the elasticity of the skin texture. With Ginseng being a famous product in Korea, this mask is full of Ginseng essence to improve dull and loose skin.

Suitable for all skin types.

How to use:
Gently apply sheet mask over cleansed face. Leave the sheet on for 20-30minutes and gently pat excess essence to let it be absorbed into the skin.

Contents: 10 sheets x 20g each


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________


Ingredients:
Imidazolidinyl urea, Methylparaben, Sodium citrate, 
Panax ginseng root extract: 6mg, Collagen: 0.6mg, Coenzyme-Q10: 0.9mg

name: The Noblesse EGCG Ampoule
description:
An intensive, skin immersion system that prevents and corrects all signs of aging and uneven pigmentation, replenishing optimum resilience, energy and overall skin balance.  The Noblesse EGCG Ampoule is ideal for all skin types, ranging from younger skin that requires preventive anti-aging and whitening care to more mature skin that demands both repair and prevention.  EGCG boosts overall skin function and appearance by stimulating cell renewal.

How to use:
Shake bottle and apply onto face after daily cleansing and toner application. Wait for the serum to be completely absorbed into skin, and continue with skincare routine by applying moisturizer.

Note: Keep the Ampoule bottles in the refrigerator after usage.
 
Contents: 4 bottles x 10 ml each


MADE IN KOREA

name: Wrinkletox Serum
description:
Apply the Silicone Elastomer onto the skin to fill up the fine lines on the skin around the eyes and mouth and to conceal imperfections for sleek and elastic skin. Wrinkletox also absorbs sebum and keeps the skin grease-free and refreshed. Compatible with foundation and other types of makeup. Its anti-aging ingredients, Vitamin A, Adenosine and EGF help reduce wrinkles and leave the skin looking more youthful.

Achieve smooth make up results and helps fade away blotchy uneven skin tones, resulting in sleek complexion.

Suitable for all skin types.

How to use : 
After application of the moisturizer, apply and pat around the fine lines of eyes and mouth as well as around pimples or scars. Wait until it is absorbed into skin and apply your makeup. To lengthen the benefit of the serum, re-apply over the desired area after removing makeup. 

Contents: 4 bottles x 5 ml each


MADE IN KOREA

name: Sunblock Pact 50+ SPF
description:
A  powerful UV sunblock (SPF50+, PA+++) that comes in the form of a compact powder with mirror. Application is easy with a puff provided and it effectively protects the skin from UV rays for several hours. It is portable and easy to bring around, simply drop it into your make up pouch! 

This sunblock is a selective absorption powder that is highly purified white powder that protects the skin from harmful environmental factors and keeps the skin smooth and healthy. Formulated by low melting point system, the product melts at body temperature to give silky and soft touch to the skin, leaving an even tone on the face as it blends in perfectly with your skin tone.

Suitable for all skin types.

How to use: Use puff to pat the powder evenly around face and watch it blend it perfectly with your skin tone.


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________


Ingredients (INCI):
Dicaprylyl carbonate, Silica, Ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, Lauryl laurate, Hydroxyapatite, Zinc oxide (CI 77947), Titanium dioxide (CI 77891), Isoamyl p-Methoxycinnamate, Microcrystalline wax, Ceresin, Polyethylene, Caprylic/Capric triglyceride, Cyclopentasiloxane, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cetearyl glucoside, Cetearyl alcohol, C30-45 Alkyl cetearyl dimethicone crosspolymer, Methicone, Allantoin, Corallium rubrum powder, Aspalathus linearis extract, Lilium candidum extract, Portulaca oleracea extract, Borago officinalis extract, Salvia officinalis extract, Centaurea cyanus flower extract, Anthemis nobilis flower extract, Aluminium hydroxide, Stearic acid, Dimethicone Ascorbyl tetraisopalmitate, Aqua, Butylene glycol, Methylparaben, Perfume, Ultramarine (CI 77007)

name: Sleeping Pack
description:
Locks moisture and nutrients onto the skin, preventing it from being dehydrated during a night's rest. Massage onto tired or loose skin to promoted growth of balanced skin, while strengthening skin barrier and skin texture. The sleeping pack also promotes peripheral circulation and accelerates cutaneous cellular exchange. Skin will be deeply moisturized and awake to lustrous and relaxed skin that looks brighter.

How to use:
Apply onto face after completing your daily skincare routine and spread it evenly with a gentle massage before heading to bed.

Contents: 50ml

MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________


Ingredients (INCI):
Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Mannan, Mushroom Extract, Green Tea Extract, Ginseng Extract, Arbutin, Trocopheryl Acetate, Marine-Collagen, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyldimethicconecrosscocpolymer, Allantoin, Quince Seed Extract, Angelica Gigas Root Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizat, Lecithin, beta-Glucan, Ginkgo Extract, Polyacryl Amide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, laureth-7, Betain, Methylparaben, Imidazolidinyl Urea, Retinyl Palmitate, Ceramide 3

name: Shape Memory Lifting Essence
description:
An essence that actually works to lift your face from aging skin. 

With advance technology, Shape Memory Lifting Essence helps to recover tired, loose, dry or rough skin to its natural texture by lifting and firming the skin. It keeps the skin soft and lean, while protecting it from harmful environmental threats or inner peroxidants.

The Shape Memory Lifting Essence could be used as a follow up product after completing your treatment with Wrinkletox Serum, so as to keep the loose skin at bay. Alternatively, the Shape Memory Lifting Essence could be used to fight skin with minor wrinkle problems.

For all skin types.

How to use: After application of daily skincare, gently massage it onto loose or wrinkled skin.

Contents: 30ml


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________


Ingredients:
Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, PEG-240/HDI Copolymer Bis-Decyltetradeceth-20 Ether, Propolis Extract, Camelia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Grape Fruit Extract, Algae Extract, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Betaglucan, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethl Hexyl Glycerin, Adenosine, Acetyl Hexapeptide, Mannan, Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Placental Protein, Ceramid-3, Human Oligopeptide-1, Fragrance

name: Protection BB Cream
description:
This BB cream is moist and its soft touch smoothens the skin for a natural and even skin tone, resulting in clear and radiant skin. It also forms a protective layer on our sensitive skin to block harmful environmental factors. The vegetable-based Squalane helps keep the skin soft, and the highly moisturizing Hyaluronic acid maintains the moisture of the skin and keep it lively all day long. The soft Silicone gel in the BB cream enhance the skin to be smooth and firm and efficiently controls sebum for brilliant and oil-free skin.

How to use
Dab evenly onto your skin, after applying the moisturizer such as Silky Essence (for oily skin) or Phyto Aqua Emulsion (for dry skin)

Contents: 40ml


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________

Ingredients:
Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, Titanium dioxide (CI 77891), Cyclohexasiloxane, Glycerin, Squalane, Butylene glycol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Dicaprylyl carbonate, C30-45 Alkyl cetearyl dimethicone crosspolymer, Sorbitan isostearate, Phenyl trimethicone, Dimethicone, Sodium chloride, Disteardimonium hectorite, Stearoyl inulin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Beta-glucan, Centaurea cyanus flower water, Diospyros kaki extract, Fagus crenata shoot extract, Portulaca oleracea extract, Acetylglucosamine, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Sodium hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Chlorphenesin, Propyl paraben, Phenoxyethanol, Butylparaben, Ethylparaben, Isobutyl paraben, Perfume, Yellow iron oxide (CI 77492), Black iron oxide (CI 77499) Red iron oxide (CI 77491), Mica (CI 77019)

name: Phyto Aqua Toner
description:
This toner is made with natural Phyto oil which contains a high level of moisture, only made possible with the latest technology. 
The Olive and Grapefruit extract allows the toner to be quickly absorbed into the skin, leaving your skin moisturized and ready to absorb the rest of your skincare routine. Phyto Aqua Toner is also suitable for wrinkle care as it will keep your skin well hydrated and improves dull skin.

Use during the day and night. For all skin types

Contents: 150ml


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________

Ingredients:
Water, Glycerin, Alcohol, Dipropylene Glycol, Saccharomyces/Imperata Cylindrica Root Ferment Extract, Glycereth-26 Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglutamic acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Glyceryl acrylate/Acrylic acid copolymer, Trehalose, Butylene Glcol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Panthenol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Caramel, Lecithin, Adenosine, Disodium EDTA, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Cyperus Payrus Stem Extract, Fragrance

name: Phyto Aqua Emulsion
description:
A moisturizer that is rich in hydrating components. It is made with natural Phyto oil which contains a high level of moisture, only made possible with the latest technology.With grapefruit extracts, this moisturizer is well suited for fight aging skin from dullness and wrinkles. 

Suitable for dry skin to combination skin types.

How to use: Gently pat it evenly around the face, leaving out the eyes area. Best used with Phyto Aqua Toner.

Contents: 150ml


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________

Ingredients:
Water, Clycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, pentaeryl Tetraoleate, Carbomer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cyclopentasiloxane, DI-C12-13 Alkyl Malate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Trehalose, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglutamic acid, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Tri-C14-15 Alkyl Citrate, Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Dimenthiconol, Lecithin, Stearic acid, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Potassium Hydroxide, Adenosine, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Saccharomyces/Imperata Cylindrica Root Ferment Extract, Tremelia Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Cyperus Papyrus Stem Extract, Fragrance

name: Phyto Aqua Cream
description:
A hydrating cream that is suitable for dry skin. This cream is made with natural Phyto oil which contains a high level of moisture, only made possible with the latest technology. Apply it in generous amount before you turn in and awake to find your skin to be looking more youthful. The heavy texture of the Aqua Cream is a good skincare product to fight wrinkles and aging skin.

Suitable for dry skin type.

How to use: Gently pat the cream around the whole face except eyes area. Best used Phyto Aqua Toner and Sleeping Pack

Contents: 50ml


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________


All ingredients (INCI): 
Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Glycerin, Dipropylene glycol, Caprylic/Capric triglyceride, Neopentyl glycol diheptanoate, DI-C12-13 Alkyl malate, 
Pentaerythrityl tetra oleate, Urea, Polyglutamic acid, Dimethicone, Lauryl PEG-8 Dimethicone, Hydrogenated lecithin, Olea europeae, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Disteardimonium hectorite, Sodium lactate, Trehalose, Glycosyl trehalose, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone/Vinyl dimethicone crosspolymer, Beeswax, Tri-C14-15 Alkyl citrate, Trihydroxystearin, Lecithin, Propylene carbonate, Adenosine, Disodium EDTA, Saccharomyces/Imperata cylindrica root ferment extract, Tremella fuciformis extract, Pueraria lobata extract, Cyperus papyrus stem extract, Perfume

name: Peeling Gel
description:
Thanks to the highly moisturizing effects of backrouncho (peuntiaficus-indica) extract, old keratinocyte on the skin surface is removed and makes the skin soft and brighter. While massaging the Peeling Gel on the face, the natural ingredient, Willow extracts and Cellulose powder, dissolves the keratinocyte, allowing a soft elimination of residues inside the pores and reveal of new skin.

With Gingko Biloba extracts, the dull and tired skin recovers its natural tone and vitality. Skin irritation is minimized while providing a high moisture level to the skin, thanks to Licolice Root extracts.

How to use:
Apply on dry skin, enough to cover the face after your daily cleansing. The gel turns into a water-like texture after 1-2 minutes, then massage gently before rinsing. Use up to 3 times weekly.

Contents: 60ml


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________


Ingredients (INCI):
Aqua, PEG-8, Glycerin, Alcohol denatured 40-B, Cellulose, Arginine, Opuntia tuna fruit extract, Carbomer, Sodium hyaluronate, Methylparaben, Imidazolidinyl urea, Panthenol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated castor oil, PPG-26- Buteth-26, Ginkgo biloba leaf extract, Perfume, Dipotassium glycyrrhizinate, Disodium EDTA, Salix nigra bark extract, AKA401, Acid Blue 9, Butylphenyl methylpropional, Benzyl salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl ionone, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene carboxaldehyde

name: O2 Bubble Cleanser
description:
An essential piece in your skincare routine as it deep-cleanses your skin as you might find your pores clogged from the daily air pollution it comes into contact with. The bubble cleanser also fights dull and uneven skin tone as it infuses oxygen into your skin as it fizzes as you apply it onto your face. Long gone will be the worry of dehydrated skin even if you find yourself working long hours in air-conditioned spaces. 

Leaves your skin amazingly fresh and clean.

How to use:
Evenly spread over the face and neck when they are dry. 
Wait until bubbles form and massage gently. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and finish it with cold water

Contents: 100ml


MADE IN KOREA

________________________________________

Ingredients (INCI):
Glycerin, Xantangum, PEG-7, Glyceryl cocoate, Methylparaben, Benzophenone-9, Acrylate copolymer, Sodium laureth sulphate, Cocoamphocarboxyglycinate,

description:
An amazingly lightweight and hydrating moisturizer in cream form that is non-oily and non-greasy. Apply it in the morning to keep your skin hydrated all day long, and applying it before you sleep will keep your skin radiant and well-hydrated. It is also great at preventing your skin against aging while preserving the skinâ€™s elasticity.

Suitable for oily to combination skin type.

name: Aqua Collagen Eye Cream
description:
This eye cream comes with a nourishing texture which deeply penetrates into the skin around the eyes to form a moisturizing and protective layer. Provides abundant oil and water to keep the skin hydrated for several hours. Hydrolyzed collagen and CoQsome ensures that the skin is firm and supple. Sodium hyaluronate, Betaine, and Advanced Moisture Complex adjust the skinâ€™s oil and water ratio, leaving moist and soft skin.

Suitable for all skin types.

How to use: Gently pat the cream to the eye area until absorbed

Contents: 30g 


MADE IN KOREA
